mapper.insert: insert into member (mem_id, ref_id, mem_openid, mem_head, mem_name, mem_tel, mem_idcardnum, mem_idcardfront, mem_idcardreverse, mem_idcardreason, mem_sex, mem_call, mem_realnamestate, mem_vipstate, mem_vipterm, mem_employment, mem_workform, mem_contracttype, mem_workyear, mem_agerange, mem_nativedemand, mem_worktime, mem_servicetime, mem_expectpay, mem_otherdemand, mem_createtime, mem_state, mem_nickname, mem_stewardtype, mem_skilldemand ) values (#{memId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{refId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memOpenid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memHead,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memIdcardnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memIdcardfront,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memIdcardreverse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memIdcardreason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memSex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memCall,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memRealnamestate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memVipstate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memVipterm,jdbcType=DATE}, #{memEmployment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memWorkform,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memContracttype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memWorkyear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memAgerange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memNativedemand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memWorktime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memServicetime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memExpectpay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memOtherdemand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{memState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memNickname,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{memStewardtype,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{memSkilldemand,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update member set ref_id = #{refId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mem_openid = #{memOpenid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mem_head = #{memHead,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mem_name = #{memName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mem_tel = #{memTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mem_idcardnum = #{memIdcardnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mem_idcardfront = #{memIdcardfront,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mem_idcardreverse = #{memIdcardreverse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mem_idcardreason = #{memIdcardreason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mem_sex = #{memSex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mem_call = #{memCall,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mem_realnamestate = #{memRealnamestate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mem_vipstate = #{memVipstate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mem_vipterm = #{memVipterm,jdbcType=DATE}, mem_employment = #{memEmployment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mem_workform = #{memWorkform,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mem_contracttype = #{memContracttype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mem_workyear = #{memWorkyear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mem_agerange = #{memAgerange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mem_nativedemand = #{memNativedemand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mem_worktime = #{memWorktime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mem_servicetime = #{memServicetime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mem_expectpay = #{memExpectpay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mem_otherdemand = #{memOtherdemand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mem_createtime = #{memCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, mem_state = #{memState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mem_nickname = #{memNickname,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, mem_stewardtype = #{memStewardtype,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, mem_skilldemand = #{memSkilldemand,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where mem_id = #{memId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select mem_id, ref_id, mem_openid, mem_head, mem_name, mem_tel, mem_idcardnum, mem_idcardfront, mem_idcardreverse, mem_idcardreason, mem_sex, mem_call, mem_realnamestate, mem_vipstate, mem_vipterm, mem_employment, mem_workform, mem_contracttype, mem_workyear, mem_agerange, mem_nativedemand, mem_worktime, mem_servicetime, mem_expectpay, mem_otherdemand, mem_createtime, mem_state, mem_nickname, mem_stewardtype, mem_skilldemand from member where mem_id = #{memId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select mem_id, ref_id, mem_openid, mem_head, mem_name, mem_tel, mem_idcardnum, mem_idcardfront, mem_idcardreverse, mem_idcardreason, mem_sex, mem_call, mem_realnamestate, mem_vipstate, mem_vipterm, mem_employment, mem_workform, mem_contracttype, mem_workyear, mem_agerange, mem_nativedemand, mem_worktime, mem_servicetime, mem_expectpay, mem_otherdemand, mem_createtime, mem_state, mem_nickname, mem_stewardtype, mem_skilldemand from member

select mem_id, ref_id, mem_openid, mem_head, mem_name, mem_tel, mem_idcardnum, mem_idcardfront, mem_idcardreverse, mem_idcardreason, mem_sex, mem_call, mem_realnamestate, mem_vipstate, mem_vipterm, mem_employment, mem_workform, mem_contracttype, mem_workyear, mem_agerange, mem_nativedemand, mem_worktime, mem_servicetime, mem_expectpay, mem_otherdemand, mem_createtime, mem_state, mem_nickname, mem_stewardtype, mem_skilldemand from member where mem_stewardtype like '%${stId}%'

select mem_id, ref_id, mem_openid, mem_head, mem_name, mem_tel, mem_idcardnum, mem_idcardfront, mem_idcardreverse, mem_idcardreason, mem_sex, mem_call, mem_realnamestate, mem_vipstate, mem_vipterm, mem_employment, mem_workform, mem_contracttype, mem_workyear, mem_agerange, mem_nativedemand, mem_worktime, mem_servicetime, mem_expectpay, mem_otherdemand, mem_createtime, mem_state, mem_nickname, mem_stewardtype, mem_skilldemand from member where mem_skilldemand like '%${skillId}%'
select * from member where mem_name = #{memName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and mem_tel = #{memTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select mem_name from member where mem_tel = #{memTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
select * from member where mem_tel=#{ mem_tel}
